bytesTotal.description: Total number of bytes representing the JSON encoded documents

transformStats.description: Stats for a specific transform of a derivation, which will have an update, publish, or both.

input.description: The input documents that were fed into this transform.

lastSourcePublishedAt.description: The publication timestamp of the most recently processed source document.

source.description: The name of the collection that this transform sources from

__flowInline1.description: Statistics related to the processing of a Flow capture, derivation, or materialization

right.description: Documents fed into the combiner from the source

capture.description: Capture stats, organized by collection. The keys of this object are the collection names, and the values are the stats for that collection.

transforms.description: A map of each transform (transform name, not collection name) to stats for that transform

uptimeSeconds.description: Number of seconds that the task shard is metered as having been running

usageRate.description: Usage rate which adjusts `uptimeSeconds` to determine the task's effective usage

lastSourcePublishedAt.description: The publication timestamp of the most recently processed source document.

bytesTotal.description: Total number of bytes representing the JSON encoded documents

materialize.description: A map of each binding source (collection name) to combiner stats for that binding

openSecondsTotal.description: Total time that the transaction was open before starting to commit

ts.description: Timestamp corresponding to the start of the transaction

txnCount.description: Total number of transactions represented by this stats document

__flowInline1.title: Flow task stats

__flowInline2.description: Identifies a specific shard of a task, which may be the source of a log message or metrics

build.description: The id of the build that this shard was running at the time the log was written

keyBegin.description: The inclusive beginning of the shard's assigned key range

kind.description: The type of the catalog task

name.description: The name of the catalog task (without the task type prefix)

rClockBegin.description: The inclusive beginning of the shard's assigned rClock range

__flowInline2.title: Flow shard id

logCount.description: Total number of matching log events

schema.description: Statistics related to the processing of a Flow catalog.

grain.description: Time grain that the stats are aggregated over

txnCount.description: Total number of transactions that have been successfully processed

usageSeconds.description: Cumulative number of metered seconds of task usage

ts.description: Timestamp of the catalog stat aggregate

schema.title: Flow catalog task stats

__flowInline1.description: Identifies a specific shard of a task, which may be the source of a log message or metrics

build.description: The id of the build that this shard was running at the time the log was written

keyBegin.description: The inclusive beginning of the shard's assigned key range

kind.description: The type of the catalog task

name.description: The name of the catalog task (without the task type prefix)

rClockBegin.description: The inclusive beginning of the shard's assigned rClock range

__flowInline1.title: Flow shard id

schema.description: Logs related to the processing of a Flow capture, derivation, or materialization

fields.description: Map of keys and values that are associated with this log entry.

error.description: If the log entry is an error, this field contains the error message.

eventType.description:
Identifies this log message as an event of the given type. Events
are special logs that are meant to be observed by the Flow control plane.

ts.description: Timestamp corresponding to the start of the transaction

schema.title: Flow task logs

collection_name.description: The name of the collection that this schema was inferred for
